card.name: Kaervek's Gambit
card.text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. During that combat phase, you can't attack players.

card.name: Opal Horn
card.text: Basic lands you control have "Whenever you tap this land for mana, it deals 1 damage to each opponent."

card.name: Hero of Femeref
card.text: Whenever Hero of Femeref deals combat damage to a player or battle, amass X, where X is the damage dealt. (To amass X, put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.) Whenever an Army token you control attacks, each attacking creature with lesser power gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Bloodthirsty Conqueror
card.text: Flying, deathtouch Whenever an opponent loses life, you gain that much life. (Damage causes loss of life.)

card.name: Prosperous Bloom
card.text: As a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may exile a card from your hand. If you do, that land enters the battlefield with a cadaver counter on it. Whenever you tap a land with a cadaver counter on it for mana, add one mana of any color.

card.name: The Amber Cage
card.text: When The Amber Cage enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls. {T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors.

card.name: Teferi, Steward of Zhalfir
card.text: If a permanent an opponent controls would phase in, it phases in tapped with a stun counter on it instead. [+1]: Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card this way, gain 3 life. [0]: Target nonland permanent phases out. [-6]: For each opponent, choose land or nonland. All permanents of the chosen type that player controls phase out.

card.name: Spiteful Deed
card.text: {X}, Sacrifice Spiteful Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with mana value X or less.

card.name: Revocation Sphere
card.text: As this Revocation Sphere enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.

card.name: Hardy Canyon
card.text: {T}, Pay 2 life: Add one mana of any color. Put a +1/+1 counter on Hardy Canyon. {4}: Hardy Canyon becomes a 2/2 green Rhino creature token with trample until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Asmira's Resolve
card.text: Battle spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever a battle you control is defeated, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Steel-Maw Chimera
card.text: Steel-Maw Chimera enters the battlefield with a menace counter and two +1/+1 counters on it. When Steel-Maw Chimera dies, distribute its counters among creatures you control.

card.name: Teferi's Portal
card.text: Each nonland permanent card in your hand without timestream has timestream. Its timestream cost is equal to its mana cost reduced by {2}. (If you cast a spell for its timestream cost, it phases out when it enters and doesn't phase in during your next turn.)

card.name: Steadfast Sidar
card.text: Double strike Whenever Steadfast Sidar outflanks, may return target nonland permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (A creature outflanks when instructed to or when it attacks and isn't blocked by creatures with equal or greater total power.)

card.name: Jolrael's Acolyte
card.text: When Jolrael's Acolyte enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 colorless Drake artifact creature tokens with flying. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Drakes you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Vengeful Shetani
card.text: Menace, lifelink Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it entered from a graveyard or was cast from a graveyard, you may have it become a copy of Vengeful Shetani.

card.name: Held in the Lion's Eye
card.text: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards and add that much mana of any one color.

card.name: Gaea's Troubadour
card.text: Whenever a basic land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

card.name: Overgrown Isle
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. Activate only if you control a Forest.

card.name: Tainted Wood
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. Activate only if you control a Swamp.

card.name: Drowned Peak
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. Activate only if you control an Island.

card.name: Sweeping Mire
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. Activate only if you control a Plains.

card.name: Mtenda Scavenger
card.text: As long as it's your turn, Mtenda Scavenger has first strike. {4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Aku Revenant
card.text: During your turn, Aku Revenant has flying.

card.name: Child of Uktabi
card.text: When Child of Uktabi dies, put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.

card.name: Council Owemfo
card.text: Whenever Council Owemfo outflanks, you gain 2 life. (A creature outflanks when instructed to or when it attacks and isn't blocked by creatures with equal or greater total power.)

card.name: Femeref Wanderer
card.text: Timestream {1}{W} (If you cast this for its timestream cost, it phases out when it enters and doesn't phase in during your next turn. Treat phased out permanents and anything attached to them as though they don't exist.) When Femeref Wanderer enters the battlefield, return up to one other target permanent you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Huddled Survivor
card.text: When Huddled Survivor enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw a card.

card.name: Ufunguo Stalwart
card.text: When Ufunguo Stalwart enters the battlefield, up to one target nonland permanent phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Titan Roc
card.text: Flying When Titan Roc enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)

card.name: Night-Sky Efreet
card.text: Timestream {3}{W} (If you cast this for its timestream cost, it phases out when it enters and doesn't phase in during your next turn. Treat phased out permanents and anything attached to them as though they don't exist.) When Night-Sky Efreet enters the battlefield, distribute two +1/+1 counters among creatures you control.

card.name: Intungunono Cloudchaser
card.text: Flying When Intungunono Cloudchaser enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

card.name: Bind in Amber
card.text: When Bind in Amber enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Bind in Amber leaves the battlefield. When Bind in Amber leaves the battlefield, create a tapped Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Strategic Patience
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You may have it outflank.

card.name: Silence of the Grave
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.

card.name: Council of Voices
card.text: Lifelink If you would gain life, you may create that many 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens instead. Do this only once each turn. Tap three untapped creatures you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on Council of Voices. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Moment of Preparation
card.text: Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Jamuraa's Desolation
card.text: Each phased out creature phases in. Then destroy all creatures.

card.name: Avenging Seraph
card.text: Flash Flying When Avenging Seraph enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose between one, two, or three target attacking creatures, blocking creatures, and/or battles.

card.name: Kora Elegist
card.text: Other creatures you control get +1/+1. Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Archpriest's Charm
card.text: Choose one — • Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller draws a card. • Create two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens. • Return target nonland permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Aspirising Isosha
card.text: Whenever you cast a battle spell or whenever a battle you control is defeated — • If Aspirising Isosha is a Ranger, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes a Human Warrior. • If Aspirising Isosha is a Warrior, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes a Human Knight. • If Aspirising Isosha is a Knight, create two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens.

card.name: Imperious Thekwane
card.text: Timestream {1}{W} (If you cast this for its timestream cost, it phases out when it enters and doesn't phase in during your next turn.) Flying When Imperious Thekwane enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Unyaro Herder
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +1/+0 and gain your choice of first strike or vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Femeref Missionary
card.text: Whenever Femeref Missionary attacks, target attacking creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Teferi's Banisher
card.text: Timestream {1}{W}{W} (If you cast this for its timestream cost, it phases out when it enters and doesn't phase in during your next turn.) When Teferi's Banisher enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Teferi's Banisher leaves the battlefield. (Phasing out does not leave the battlefield.)

card.name: Kondo's Champion
card.text: Whenever Kondo's Champion outflanks, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a nonland permanent card with mana value 3 or less, put it into your hand. (A creature outflanks when instructed to or when it attacks and isn't blocked by creatures with equal or greater total power.)

card.name: Disputed Veld
card.text: ({T}: Add {W}.) Disputed Veld enters the battlefield tapped. {3}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Disputed Veld: Amass 3. Put a lifelink counter on an Army you control. Activate only as a sorcery. (To amass 3, put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)

card.name: Patient Ibis
card.text: Flying, lifelink Whenever Patient Ibis deals combat damage to a battle, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Femeref Custodian
card.text: Whenever Femeref Custodian attacks, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)

card.name: Loreweaver's Apprentice
card.text: Flash When Loreweaver's Apprentice enters the battlefield, target creature you control phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Zhalfirin Armorer
card.text: Timestream {W} (If you cast this for its timestream cost, it phases out when it enters and doesn't phase in during your next turn.) Whenever another creature you control phases in, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Scour Clear
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller draws a card.

card.name: Sequester
card.text: Counter target spell or ability that targets you or a permanent you control.

card.name: Long Day's Journey
card.text: Target creature you control gains shielded and lifelink until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it. (Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.)

card.name: Eternal War
card.text: Return target battle card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Suq'Ata Merchant
card.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. This ability costs {1}{U} less to activate as long as you've cast a noncreature spell this turn.

card.name: Suq'Ata Alchemist
card.text: Whenever you put one or more counters on a permanent you control, target player mills that many cards. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Femeref Sculptor
card.text: Vigilance Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

card.name: Haughty Timeblade
card.text: Haughty Timeblade can't be blocked except by creatures with lesser power.

card.name: Urborg Wyvern
card.text: Flying When Urborg Wyvern enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)

card.name: Mtenda Regent
card.text: Flying Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

card.name: Ferocious Lukwata
card.text: Timestream {3}{U} (If you cast this for its timestream cost, it phases out when it enters and doesn't phase in during your next turn. Treat phased out permanents and anything attached to them as though they don't exist.) Ferocious Lukwata can't be blocked by creature tokens.

card.name: Breach the Surface
card.text: Up to one target creature you control and up to one target creature you don't control each phase out. (Treat them and anything attached to them as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Stymied Attack
card.text: Counter target spell. Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)

card.name: Teferi's Prodigy
card.text: Timestream {1}{U} (If you cast this for its timestream cost, it phases out when it enters and doesn't phase in during your next turn. Treat phased out permanents and anything attached to them as though they don't exist.) When Teferi's Prodigy enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Kukemssa Breeze
card.text: Draw two cards. Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)

card.name: Tales of War
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 0/1, loses all abilities, and has defender and "{2}, Sacrifice this creature: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery."

card.name: The Still Mountain Air
card.text: Target creature's owner puts it on their choice of the top or bottom of their library.

card.name: On the Cusp of Triumph
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When On the Cusp of Triumph enters the battlefield or is defeated, take an extra turn after this one. If On the Cusp of Triumph would leave the battlefield, exile it instead.

card.name: Taniwha, Lord of Kukemssa
card.text: Vigilance, trample Whenever Taniwha, Lord of Kukemssa enters the battlefield or attacks, up to one target permanent phases out until Taniwha leaves the battlefield. That permanent's controller creates a colorless Island land token. (Islands have "{T}: Add {U}.")

card.name: Flee from Chaos
card.text: Up to one target creature phases out, then return each creature to its owner's hand. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Amazimu Riddlekeeper
Heron Dancer
card.text: You may have Heron Dancer enters the battlefield as a copy of any creature or battle on the battlefield.

card.name: Devotee of Teferi
card.text: Creatures you control phasing in cause abilities to trigger as though those creatures entered the battlefield. Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Beasts of No Nation
card.text: Creatures you control have prowess. (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, those creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.)

card.name: Shaper Novitiate
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your end step, draw a card if you've put three or more counters on permanents this turn, then draw a card if you've removed three or more counters from permanents this turn.

card.name: Zhalfirin Smokeshifter
card.text: Whenever Zhalfirin Smokeshifter attacks, target creature you control can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Stormcloud Impundulu
card.text: Flying You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast noncreature spells from the top of your library.

card.name: Disputed Falls
card.text: ({T}: Add {U}.) Disputed Falls enters the battlefield tapped. {3}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Disputed Falls: Amass 3. Put a flying counter on an Army you control. Activate only as a sorcery. (To amass 3, put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)

card.name: Kukemssa Reaver
card.text: Timestream {U} (If you cast this for its timestream cost, it phases out when it enters and doesn't phase in during your next turn.) Whenever another creature you control phases in, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Coral Guard
card.text: Whenever Coral Guard outflanks, draw a card. (A creature outflanks when instructed to or when it attacks and isn't blocked by creatures with equal or greater total power.)

card.name: Exclusion Guard
card.text: Vigilance When Exclusion Guard enters the battlefield, return up to one target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Consign to Myth
card.text: Counter target creature spell. Its controller creates a token that's a copy of it, except it has base power and toughness 1/1.

card.name: Solitary Shores
card.text: Amass 1. When you do, counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the amassed Army's power. (To amass 1, put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)

card.name: Calm Waters
card.text: Counter target battle or enchantment spell.

card.name: Djinn's Promise
card.text: Draw three cards, then discard two cards. When you do, remove up to X counters from target permanent, where X is the highest mana value among cards discarded this way.

card.name: Thirst for Violence
card.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard a battle card.

card.name: Conquer Trade Routes
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Conquer Trade Routes enters the battlefield or is defeated, search your library for a noncreature, nonland card with mana value 4 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Snakeskin Hunter
card.text: When Snakeskin Hunter enters the battlefield or dies, remove a counter from up to one target permanent.

card.name: War's Widow
card.text: When War's Widow enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Shauku's Disciple
card.text: When Shauku's Disciple enters the battlefield or dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Wandering Asafo
card.text: Whenever Wandering Asafo outflanks, target opponent discards a card. (A creature outflanks when instructed to or when it attacks and isn't blocked by creatures with equal or greater total power.)

card.name: Tulumai Dancer
card.text: When Tulumai Dancer dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Savage Shadowmage
card.text: Menace Whenever Savage Shadowmage attacks, up to one target creature you control gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Uktabi Despot
card.text: Uktabi Despot can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

card.name: Tyrant of Aku
card.text: When Tyrant of Aku enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card, loses 2 life, then exiles three cards from their graveyard.

card.name: Last Gasp
card.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.name: Midnight Calm
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Dismay
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a battle or creature card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Deadly Derision
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Tear Down
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {4}. Exile target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Night's Confidant
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile a nonland card at random from your graveyard. You lose life equal to its mana value. Until end of turn, you may cast a copy of the exiled card.

card.name: Spirit of the Nightstalkers
card.text: You can't cast this spell unless a creature died under your control this turn. Flying, trample Spirit of the Nightstalkers gets +1/+1 for each creature card in all graveyards.

card.name: Visions of Purraj
card.text: Whenever you cast a black spell, put a vision counter on Visions of Purraj. Then you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of vision counters on Visions of Purraj.

card.name: Savage Patron
card.text: Flying {B}, Sacrifice a battle: You draw a card and you lose X life, where X is the number of defense counters on that battle.

card.name: Martial Intent
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a battle. Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Descending Gloom
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a nonland permanent. X is that permanent's mana value. Choose one or both — • Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. • Remove up to X counters from target permanent.

card.name: Kaervek, Spear of Urborg
card.text: Menace Blocking creatures get -2/-2.

card.name: Curse of the Umkovu
card.text: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn. Whenever a nontoken creature dies this turn, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)

card.name: Qori Ismaris
card.text: As long as it's not your turn, Qori Ismaris is a 1/1 Human Peasant with deathtouch.

card.name: Solemn Nkishi
card.text: Flying When Solemn Nkishi enters the battlefield, put a vessel counter on a creature you don't control. Solemn Nkishi has shielded as long as an opponent controls a creature with a vessel counter on it. (Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.)

card.name: Legion of Urborg
card.text: When Legion of Urborg outflanks, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. (A creature outflanks when instructed to or when it attacks and isn't blocked by creatures with equal or greater total power.)

card.name: Kaervek's Iwarefa
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever Kaervek's Iwarefa outflanks, each other creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn. (A creature outflanks when instructed to or when it attacks and isn't blocked by creatures with equal or greater total power.)

card.name: Disputed Mire
card.text: ({T}: Add {B}.) Disputed Mire enters the battlefield tapped. {3}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Disputed Mire: Amass 3. Put a menace counter on an Army you control. Activate only as a sorcery. (To amass 3, put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)

card.name: Lord of the Pillar Tombs
card.text: Menace Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Lord of the Pillar Tombs. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Consult the Breathstealers
card.text: Destroy target creature, enchantment, or planeswalker. You lose 3 life unless you discard a card or sacrifice a creature.

card.name: Shauku's Ritual
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter and a menace counter on it.

card.name: Madness of the Sands
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Each opponent discards a card at random, then discards a card.

card.name: March upon Chaza
card.text: When March upon Chaza enters the battlefield and whenever an Army you control attacks, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)

card.name: Eliminate
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.

card.name: Breathstealer's Betrayal
card.text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead. Until end of turn, you may cast a creature card you own exiled with Breathstealer's Betrayal.

card.name: Eternal March (old)
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Eternal March enters the battlefield or is defeated, each opponent discards two cards, then you create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each opponent who didn't discard a nonland card this way.

card.name: Tome Raider
card.text: When Tome Raider enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Voice of the Sidar
card.text: Whenever Voice of the Sidar attacks, another attacking creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Kukemssa Raider
card.text: Haste When Kukemssa Raider enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Blade of Amiqat
card.text: Whenever Blade of Amiqat outflanks, it deals 1 damage to each opponent. (A creature outflanks when instructed to or when it attacks and isn't blocked by creatures with equal or greater total power.)

card.name: Talruum Stalwart
card.text: Whenever Talruum Stalwart outflanks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. (A creature outflanks when instructed to or when it attacks and isn't blocked by creatures with equal or greater total power.)

card.name: Hulking Cyclops
card.text: Hulking Cyclops can't block or be blocked by creatures with base power 1 or less.

card.name: Zerapa Snarltusk
card.text: Menace, reach Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Zerapa Snarltusk gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Shock
card.text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Kipamu Ambush
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. You may have it outflank.

card.name: To Prepare for War
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When To Prepare for War enters the battlefield or is defeated, exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Kaervek's Judgment
card.text: Choose one — • Kaervek's Judgment deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Flame Lash
card.text: Flame Lash deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Jamuraa Burning
card.text: Jamuraa Burning deals 6 damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle.

card.name: Eliko of the Red Lance
card.text: Whenever Eliko of the Red Lance outflanks, it becomes a 5/5 Dragon until end of turn. (A creature outflanks when instructed to or when it attacks and isn't blocked by creatures with equal or greater total power.)

card.name: Suq'Ata Silkweaver
card.text: You don't lose unspent mana as steps and phases end. {13}{G}{U}: Search your library for a nonland card, exile it, then shuffle. You may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Chaos of War
card.text: Choose an order for battles, creatures, and planeswalkers. Chaos of War deals 4 damage to each permanent of the first type, 3 damage to each permanent of the second type, and 2 damage to each permanent of the third type.

card.name: Goldsmelter Regent
card.text: Flying Whenever Goldsmelter Regent is dealt damage, create that many Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") {2}{R}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Gratuitous Violence
card.text: If a creature you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage instead.

card.name: Bogardan Firebird
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever a battle you control is defeated, you may return Bogardan Firebird from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Zival of the Fang
card.text: Whenever Zival of the Fang attacks, return target Dragon creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Brazen Tutor
card.text: Any player may have Brazen Tutor deal 4 damage to them. If no one does, search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

card.name: Unorthodox Cavalry
card.text: Whenever Unorthodox Cavalry outflanks, destroy target permanent unless its controller has Unorthodox Cavalry deal damage to them equal to its power. (A creature outflanks when instructed to or when it attacks and isn't blocked by creatures with equal or greater total power.)

card.name: Great Desert Wanderer
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Great Desert Wanderer enters the battlefield, put a prowess counter on another creature you control.

card.name: JMR Draft Archetypes JMR
card.text: {W}{U} TIMESTREAM Take early advantage of enters the battlefield triggers and control the board before your creatures phase in. {U}{B} COUNTERS Battles and Armies allow you to rely on counter manipulation for victory. {B}{R} OUTFLANK Split your attacks tactically between battles and opponents to outflank your foes. {R}{G} BATTLES Attack aggressively across many fronts, while Conflicts offer you additional potency. {G}{W} AMASS Build an army big enough to conquer Jamuraa. {W}{B} OUTFLANK Outmatch your foes with evasive attackers and reap the benefits. {B}{G} BATTLES You can outlast all of Jamuraa as you battle across varied Conflicts. {G}{U} TIMESTREAM Ramp to expensive spells, or cast them early with Teferi's timestream magic. {U}{R} NONCREATURE SPELLS Battles, artifacts, and enchantments all contribute to the Mirage War. {R}{W} OUTFLANK Strike quickly and pressure your opponent with early aggression, your outflank triggers aiding the effort.

card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Caravan Raid enters the battlefield or is defeated, discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Caravan Raid
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Caravan Raid enters the battlefield or is defeated, discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Carve Out a New History (old)
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Carve Out a New History enters the battlefield or is defeated, return two cards at random from your graveyard to your hand, then exile your graveyard.

card.name: Gather a Flotilla
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Gather a Flotilla enters the battlefield or is defeated, if you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.

card.name: Confront the Endbringer
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Confront the Endbringer enters the battlefield, create three 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens. Zombies you control can't attack players.

card.name: Gather a Flotilla (old)
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Gather a Flotilla enters the battlefield or is defeated, if you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.

card.name: Confront the Endbringer (old)
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Confront the Endbringer enters the battlefield, create three 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens. Zombies you control can't attack players.

card.name: Cross the Great Desert
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Cross the Great Desert enters the battlefield or is defeated, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)

card.name: Massed Engagement (old)
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Massed Engagement enters the battlefield or is defeated,reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Zhalfirin Exemplar
card.text: Whenever you attack, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of attacking creatures. You may put an artifact, battle, or enchantment card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. (You can't attack a battle that enters this way this turn.)

card.name: Portent of War
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Portent of War enters the battlefield or is defeated, target opponent mills ten cards.

card.name: Portent of War (old)
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Portent of War enters the battlefield or is defeated, target opponent mills ten cards.

card.name: Protracted Siege (old)
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Protracted Siege enters the battlefield or is defeated, each player discards their hand. You draw cards equal to the greatest number of cards discarded this way, then each opponent draws cards equal to the smallest number of cards discarded this way.

card.name: On the Cusp of Triumph (old)
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When On the Cusp of Triumph enters the battlefield or is defeated, take an extra turn after this one. If On the Cusp of Triumph would leave the battlefield, exile it instead.
